mainEntity.name: Why pay-as-you-go instead of subscriptions?

acceptedAnswer.text: We believe in subscription fatigue relief. Instead of paying $20-200/month whether you use AI or not, you only pay for the messages you actually send. Top up your wallet with amounts from $1-500, use what you need, keep the rest. Many users spend less than $5/month this way.

mainEntity.name: How much does it typically cost to use?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Costs vary by model and message length, but here are some examples:

Simple questions (GPT-4o-mini): $0.001-0.01 per message
Complex reasoning (o3): $0.01-0.10 per message
Premium reasoning (o3-pro): $0.05-0.50 for complex tasks

The app shows you the exact cost before sending each message, so there are never surprises.

mainEntity.name: What happens to unused wallet funds?

acceptedAnswer.text: Your wallet funds never expire and are non-refundable. You can use them whenever you want, even months later. There are no monthly fees or account maintenance charges.

mainEntity.name: Can I get a refund on wallet funds?

acceptedAnswer.text: Wallet funds are non-refundable once added, as stated in our terms. However, they never expire, so you can use them whenever you're ready.

mainEntity.name: Why would I pay when ChatGPT is free?

acceptedAnswer.text:
You probably shouldn't—if free ChatGPT's limitations work for you.

Free tier limitations:
- Rate limits that OpenAI doesn't publish or explain
- "Try again later" messages that cut you off mid-work
- Context truncation: Your conversation history gets shortened automatically—you don't control it
- Automatic model switching: Downgraded to lower-quality models without notification
- No visibility: Can't see which model you're using or how much capacity remains
- "At capacity" errors: Access denied during peak hours

Consider Lookinglass if:
- You need predictability: No surprise limits or "try again later"
- Context matters: Control how much conversation history the AI remembers (500 tokens to 1M)
- Quality consistency matters: Choose your model, get consistent results every time
- You need transparency: See your balance, costs, model, and tokens—always
- You need pro models: Access o3-pro, o1-pro, gpt-5-pro without $200/month subscriptions

Start with $1 free credit and compare the experience yourself.

mainEntity.name: Which AI models are included?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Lookinglass provides access to 19 OpenAI models including:

GPT Models: GPT-5, GPT-4o, GPT-4o-mini, and variants
O-Series (Reasoning): o1, o1-mini, o3, o3-mini, o4-mini, o3-pro

You can switch between models mid-conversation based on your needs.

mainEntity.name: How is this different from ChatGPT?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Transparency & Control: ChatGPT decides which model handles your request and automatically truncates conversation history to manage costs. With Lookinglass, YOU choose the model, YOU control context window size (500 tokens to 1M), and YOU see exactly what you're paying for.

Predictable Quality: ChatGPT routes to different models behind the scenes, so quality varies. Lookinglass gives you the exact model you selected—every time.

Fair Pricing: Subscriptions charge the same whether you send 10 messages or 1,000. With Lookinglass, light months cost less, heavy months cost more. Your bill matches your actual usage.

mainEntity.name: What's special about o3-pro access?

acceptedAnswer.text: o3-pro is OpenAI's most advanced reasoning model, normally exclusive to ChatGPT Pro subscribers ($200/month). Lookinglass gives you access on a pay-per-message basis, so you can use it for important tasks without the monthly commitment.

mainEntity.name: What is smart savings?

acceptedAnswer.text: Smart savings saves you 50% on message costs if you're willing to wait a bit longer for responses. It's available on select models (gpt-5 series, o3, o4-mini) and perfect for non-urgent tasks where you want to optimize for cost over speed.

mainEntity.name: Is my data private and secure?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Yes. We take privacy seriously:

No conversation storage: We don't store your messages or AI responses
Minimal metadata: Only billing and basic usage info is kept
Apple Sign-In: Secure authentication without exposing personal data
Guest mode: Use completely anonymously if preferred

mainEntity.name: What information do you collect?

acceptedAnswer.text:
We collect minimal data for billing and app functionality:

Which model you used and when
Token counts for accurate billing
Basic account info (if you sign in with Apple)

We never see your actual conversations or prompts.

mainEntity.name: What is "permanent memory" and how does it work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Permanent memory lets you tell the AI key information about yourself once, and it remembers across all conversations. For example: "I'm a Python developer working on iOS apps." This context gets included automatically, so you don't need to re-explain your background each time.

mainEntity.name: Can I control how much the AI remembers?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Absolutely! You have full control over smart memory (context window):

Toggle on/off: Enable or disable conversation history entirely
When enabled: Set from 500 tokens (minimum) up to your model's maximum context
Adjustable in 500-token increments: Fine-tune exactly how much history the AI remembers
Response length control: Set output tokens from 100 (minimum) in 100-token increments

More context costs more but provides better continuity.

mainEntity.name: What is spending protection?

acceptedAnswer.text: Spending protection alerts you before sending messages that exceed your chosen threshold. Enable spending alerts in settings, set your preferred threshold (like $0.01, $0.10, or any amount), and you'll get a warning before accidentally sending an expensive message.

mainEntity.name: Can I use voice input?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! Lookinglass includes built-in voice-to-text, so you can speak your questions naturally instead of typing them.

mainEntity.name: Is the app free to download?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Lookinglass is completely free to download. You only pay for the AI messages you actually send.

mainEntity.name: Do I need to create an account?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Not required! You can use guest mode for complete anonymity. However, signing in with Apple allows you to:

Access your wallet and transaction history across devices
Use permanent memory features
Save conversation threads

mainEntity.name: What's the minimum amount I can add to my wallet?

acceptedAnswer.text: Just $1! You can amounts from $1 to $500. Most casual users start with $5 or $10 to try it out.

mainEntity.name: Is there an onboarding tutorial?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! The app includes an interactive tutorial that explains all the features. You can access it anytime from Settings if you want a refresher.

mainEntity.name: Which devices are supported?

acceptedAnswer.text: Lookinglass works on iPhone and iPad running iOS 15 or later. It's designed exclusively for Apple devices.

mainEntity.name: Does it work offline?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, Lookinglass requires an internet connection to communicate with AI models. However, your conversation history and settings are stored locally when possible.

mainEntity.name: Can I export my conversation history?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can export your transaction history and usage data as CSV files. Individual conversations aren't stored on our servers for privacy, but you can copy/save them locally within the app.
